General.Name: Hunan Xiangjia Animal Husbandry Co
General.Description: Hunan Xiangjia Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd engages in poultry breeding, slaughtering, and processing services in China. The company offers live, fresh whole and cut, and chilled poultry, as well as conditioning cooked food products. The company also produces feed and organic fertilizers. The company was formerly known as Hunan Shuangjia Agriculture and Animal Husbandry Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hunan Xiangjia Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd in June 2012. Hunan Xiangjia Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd company was founded in 2003 and is based in Changde, China.
